title: Tribal Edge 2: The horizontal and vertical dimensions of transformative practice w/Ben Sanford
description:
This is my second dialogos with Ben Sanford from Tribal Edge. I really like this video because Ben and I get into concrete specifics of how to enact the imaginal within serious play in a way that reaches back to primordial practices and forward into the cutting edge of our spiritual situation. 

Ben Sanford is a practitioner, teacher and leader of the primal arts movement with over 30 years of experience in the life supporting skills of human-nature connection. Ben and his wife live on the Olympic Peninsula in Washington state and offer live and online courses, coaching, and consulting at the Tribal Edge primal arts training center, Primal Solutions Coaching, and Hero Lab.

Learn more at https://www.tribaledge.life
Find Ben on Facebook at  https://www.facebook.com/tribaledgepage/  
Subscribe to Ben's YouTube channel at  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzL2SP8POIzfJAidb0g-s2Q?view_as=subscriber

This is part of my series Voices with Vervaeke: Science, Spirituality, and the Meaning Crisis.

You can support my work on Patreon, with the proceeds going into the research I do at the University of Toronto on the Meaning Crisis and the cultivation of wisdom here: https://www.patreon.com/johnvervaeke

Join the Discord Server to discuss and reflect upon my work: https://discord.gg/MXxRcmv
